-- | Please see README.md
@package ekg-prometheus-adapter
@version 0.1.0.5

module System.Remote.Monitoring.Prometheus
toPrometheusRegistry :: Store -> AdapterOptions -> IO Registry
registerEKGStore :: MonadIO m => Store -> AdapterOptions -> RegistryT m ()
data AdapterOptions
AdapterOptions :: Labels -> Maybe Text -> !Int -> AdapterOptions
[_labels] :: AdapterOptions -> Labels
[_namespace] :: AdapterOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | How often update the registry (in seconds).
[_samplingFrequency] :: AdapterOptions -> !Int
labels :: Lens' AdapterOptions Labels
namespace :: Lens' AdapterOptions (Maybe Text)
samplingFrequency :: Lens' AdapterOptions Int
defaultOptions :: Labels -> AdapterOptions
